bill.summary:
Tools On Our Local Streets to Rehabilitate Communities Act of 2018 or the TOOLS to Rehabilitate Communities Act of 2018
This bill expands eligible activities under the Community Development Block Grant program to include creating or strengthening partnerships with nonprofit organizations that provide resources to assist with authorized development or revitalization projects.
